channel.title: SIwave on QY's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in SIwave on QY's Notes

item.title: SIwave1 New Project and DC IR analysis
item.description: Using Ansys SIwave 2020R2. This post introduces a basic IR-drop analysis on the power planes using SIwave 2020R2. Analyze the voltage drop of one power rail, from source to chip. All the RLC components are deactivated except for those connected in series to the power rails. SIwave Documentation: Computing DC IR Simulations New Project Import ODB++ default setting for nets. The Workflow Wizard Open the Workflow Wizard from this button on the upper-left.

item.title: SIwave0 Allegro 16.6 Export ODB++
item.description: Export an Allegro 16.6 PCB file to ODB++, to be imported in SIwave.
